circumstances: In cruising altitude, the airplane went out of control, dove into the ground and crashed on the slope of a mountain located in the Khasi Mountain Range, near Mairang, about 60 km south of Guwahati. The aircraft was destroyed and all three crew members were killed.
probable_cause: The port wing failed in the air due to an upload as a result of being subjected to loads greater than those for which it was designed.
